cis.controller
Class CensusController

java.lang.Object
  cis.controller.CensusController

public class CensusController
extends java.lang.Object

CensusController.java CS2334 010 Programming Structures and Abstractions Project #4 April 4, 2011

This class will assign a model to the view component and assign action listeners to listen for triggers on the changes in data or interactions from the user to proceed with an action on the model or the view.

Version:
1.0

Field Summary
private  CensusModel censusModel
          This class contains all the data that will trigger viewable components in the selectionView to be enabled.
 DataEntryView entryView
          The view that will be responsible for editing data contained in Place.
 java.lang.String lastSelectedPlace
          When changing data, the place is deselected, so store this temporarily to edit the data.
 java.lang.String lastSelectedState
          When adding a new place, the state is de-selected, so store this temporarily to edit the place.
private  SelectionView selectionView
          This class contains all the GUI elements that will allow the user to interact with the program to produce results and manipulations upon the data contained within the censusModel.
 
Constructor Summary
CensusController()
           This is the default constructor for this class that does not take any arguments.

Field Detail

censusModel

private CensusModel censusModel
This class contains all the data that will trigger viewable components in the selectionView to be enabled. It will also perform the functions upon critical program data and the output it produces.

selectionView

private SelectionView selectionView
This class contains all the GUI elements that will allow the user to interact with the program to produce results and manipulations upon the data contained within the censusModel.

lastSelectedState

public java.lang.String lastSelectedState
When adding a new place, the state is de-selected, so store this temporarily to edit the place.

lastSelectedPlace

public java.lang.String lastSelectedPlace
When changing data, the place is deselected, so store this temporarily to edit the data.

entryView

public DataEntryView entryView
The view that will be responsible for editing data contained in Place.

Constructor Detail

CensusController

public CensusController()

This is the default constructor for this class that does not take any arguments. Default values are assigned to the censusModel and the selectionView since these classes do not warrant initialization restrictions - the model data acts upon this information.

Method Detail

addListeners

public void addListeners()

getView

public SelectionView getView()

This method acquires the value that is assigned to the selectionView assigned to this controller.

Returns:
The SelectionView that is assigned to this controller.
Conditions:
PRE: There must be a value assigned to selectionView.
POST: The value stored by selectionView is returned to the requester.
